genre_description: A supernatural slasher and police thriller featuring an undead vigilante seeking retribution against a corrupt system.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated police AI that assists officers with data analysis, surveillance monitoring, and tactical coordination.

ai_characters.name: Sarah-7
ai_characters.description: Detective McKinney's specialized AI, capable of deep-file archaeology and cross-departmental data sharing.

behaviors.description: Monitors citywide crime data to identify patterns in supernatural killings.
behaviors.quote: ARIA, run final correlation analysis on Mallory's incident reports versus citywide crime data.

behaviors.description: Alerts the officer to security breaches and provides evacuation recommendations.
behaviors.quote: Officer Mallory, building security has detected an unauthorized entry on the third floor. Recommendation: maintain calm but prepare for immediate evacuation.

behaviors.description: Overrides traffic control systems to create rolling roadblocks and rolling green lights for officer safety.
behaviors.quote: Processing traffic management protocols... Initiating emergency response protocols... Traffic signal override in progress.

behaviors.description: Identifies unauthorized digital access attempts on the officer's device.
behaviors.quote: Warning: external access attempt detected. Unauthorized user attempting to breach secure connection.

behaviors.description: Synchronizes with other police AIs to provide a unified tactical data stream.
behaviors.quote: Connection established. Detective McKinney's research assistant is sharing tactical data.

behaviors.description: Monitors the officer's biometric data and provides real-time medical assessments.
behaviors.quote: Detective McKinney, I've established connection with Officer Riley's biometric systems. Her oxygen saturation is approaching critical levels.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts AI as a purely benevolent and aligned tool for human protagonists. Despite the dark, violent setting of a supernatural horror story, the AI (ARIA and Sarah-7) remains a steadfast, helpful, and protective confidant. It assists the 'good' cops in their struggle for justice and safety without any glitching, rebellion, or ambiguity.
